Marcel Everett (amụrụ n'October 31, 1995), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka XXYYXX, bụ ónyé na-egwu egwu eletrọniki na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Orlando, Florida, nké bịanyere aka na akara Relief in Abstract.
A na-eji ụdị ya tụnyere Clams Casino, Zomby, Burial, James Blake na The Weeknd
Mmetụta egwu ya gụnyere Lapalux, Star Slinger, Disclosure na Shlohmo.
N'afọ na-esote mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ ga-ewepụta abọm aha ya, nké gụnyere egwu 'About You' ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ónyé a ma ama n'ime omenala egwu indie na ngwụcha afọ 2013.
Everett emeela remixed màkà ndị na-ese ihe dịka Tinashe na Usher. N'afọ 2014, o mepụtara egwu "What We Want" màkà egwuregwu vidio Grand Theft Auto V
A gụnyere egwu a màkà ụda olu gbasaa nke bụ akụkụ nke ntọhapụ nke egwuregwu ahụ na PC, Xbox One, na PlayStation 4 usoro. Ọ bụ ónyé isi nke San Francisco Noise Pop Festival na Febụwarị 2013.
N'afọ 2015, Everett wepụtara egwu "Red", nkè o kwùrù na "M na-agbalị igosipụta mmetụta, enwetakwara m nke ahụ nke ọma".

Ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'afọ 2016 na-eme njem na US, na-egwu egwu egwu ámà àmá dịka Shambhala Festival, Beach Goth, Mysteryland, na Ancient Future. E dekwara ya na egwu Tory Lanez nke afọ 2016 "Flex", nke gosipụtara na abọm ya I Told You
Ndị na-ese ihe dịka Chance the Rapper na SZA ejirila ihe nlele sitere na egwu XXYYXX mee ihe, na 2017 Everett malitere ịmepụta egwu ọzọ ọzọ ọzọ.
